getStartedDisclaimer.title: Important Legal Notice
getStartedDisclaimer.description: This tool is solely an aid to organize information about your cryptocurrency transactions. It does not constitute tax, legal, or financial advice.
getStartedDisclaimer.pointsTitle: By using this tool, you acknowledge that:
points: The calculations are indicative and must be verified by a qualified tax professional.
Cryptocurrency tax legislation may change and it is your responsibility to stay informed about current regulations.
Data is processed locally in your browser and is not stored or transmitted to any server.
It is your responsibility to verify the accuracy of all data declared to the Tax Agency.
The creator of this tool assumes no responsibility for errors or omissions in your tax declarations.
For personalized advice, consult with a qualified tax professional.

exchange.title: Choose Your Exchange
exchange.description: To get started, please select the exchange where you have conducted your cryptocurrency transactions.
